name: POST - As a user i cannot use post method to get detail user

testSteps.description: Given I set an endpoint for get detail a user
When I request POST detail user

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: x-requested-with, Authorization, Content-Type, credential, X-Import-Process, X-XSRF-TOKEN
Access-Control-Max-Age: 3600
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
Allow: GET
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Thu, 21 Jul 2022 09:03:29 GMT
Keep-Alive: timeout=60
Connection: keep-alive

testSteps.description: Then I validate the status code 405
And I get the method not allowed error
